slepc-3.18.3 2023-03-24

STGetSplitPreconditionerTerm

Gets the matrices associated with the split preconditioner.

Synopsis

#include "slepcst.h" 
PetscErrorCode STGetSplitPreconditionerTerm(ST st,PetscInt k,Mat *Psplit)
Not collective, though parallel Mats are returned if the ST is parallel

Input Parameters

st  - the spectral transformation context
k  - the index of the requested matrix (starting in 0)

Output Parameter

Psplit  - the returned matrix

See Also

STSetSplitPreconditioner(), STGetSplitPreconditionerInfo()

Level

advanced

Location

src/sys/classes/st/interface/stfunc.c

Index of all ST routines
